title: Optimizing cellulose fraction for enhanced utility: Comparative pre-treatment of Agave tequilana Weber var. blue bagasse fiber for sustainable applications
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): A. Lazaro-Romero, S.M. Contreras-Ramos, M. Dehonor-Gómez, J.M. Rojas-García, L. Amaya-Delgado
